short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the ETH price

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of the (Ethereum) ETH price in USD with this lightweight plugin. The source is Coinmarketcap.com for the best possible price indication. Updates every 5 minutes per API restrictions. 

This is an initial release, expect more features...
